mapper.insert: insert into HYDR_WATER_FLOW_MONTH (ID, WATER_FLOW_MAX, WATER_FLOW_MAX_DATE, WATER_FLOW_MIN, WATER_FLOW_MIN_DATE, WATER_FLOW_AVG, YEAR_ID, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS, MONTH, YEAR, SECTION_ID) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{waterFlowMax,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{waterFlowMaxDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{waterFlowMin,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{waterFlowMinDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{waterFlowAvg,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{yearId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{month,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{year,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sectionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update HYDR_WATER_FLOW_MONTH set WATER_FLOW_MAX = #{waterFlowMax,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, WATER_FLOW_MAX_DATE = #{waterFlowMaxDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, WATER_FLOW_MIN = #{waterFlowMin,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, WATER_FLOW_MIN_DATE = #{waterFlowMinDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, WATER_FLOW_AVG = #{waterFlowAvg,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, YEAR_ID = #{yearId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MONTH = #{month,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, YEAR = #{year,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SECTION_ID = #{sectionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, WATER_FLOW_MAX, WATER_FLOW_MAX_DATE, WATER_FLOW_MIN, WATER_FLOW_MIN_DATE, WATER_FLOW_AVG, YEAR_ID, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS, MONTH, YEAR, SECTION_ID from HYDR_WATER_FLOW_MONTH where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
